96b6(1): sa 'am/ lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni kun shes pa'i sho gam yin la gong bskyed mas tshal lam/ 'dun sa 'am/ lho'i gnas che ge mo nas
96b7(1): mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni nyes pa can yin no zhes khrims su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa gang ljags pa de lta la btsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag
96b8(1): nga'i yab kyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni/ brgya byin gyis mdzad pa tshangs pas mdzad pa yin te/ mchog tu brtsan no// sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/ lce mdzod
96b9(1): tshig ma zhig na mA ma mchis paden grangs ma'i glags bral mo ga zos pa mchis pa de ltas gzigs su gsol/ rgyal bas gtogs par byas pa dgal
97a1(1): zangs ma'i glags bu de 'on cig ces bsgo nas blangs te blags pa dang / rgyal pos pa'i bsrugs pa zas nas/ mchi ma dang bcas pa
97a2(1): skad kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i yab kyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brgya byin gyis mdzad pa tshangs pa'i mdzad pa yin te/ gal te nor thams cad bral bar
97a3(1): byas na legs so// tshong pa de dag re ba med par gyur nas/ mchi ma dang bcas pa'i skad kyis dong nas/ de dag sh+lo gam pa de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed
97a4(1): lA smras sman pa spos gag/ sho gam bdag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag la su zhig smon par 'gyur/ kho bo cag nyid kyis shes mod kyi 'on kyang kho bo cig khyed la
97a5(1): snying rje bas yal bar bor ro// khyod cag hA cang bya ba byed par brtsams pas des na kho bo cag mi bzod pa skyes so// tshong pa dag gis smras pa/ khyed la snying rje
97a6(1): ga la yod smros shig dang / kho bo cag khyed dang mdza' bor 'gyur ro// sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa drug sde dag gis so// tshong pa de dag shAkya'i
97a7(1): sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa yin no// bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te/ gang lad ltar gzhan gyi 'chi ba la yang gnod par byed do// skrod par
97a8(1): byed phyar ko gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i ska bas de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge
97a9(1): slong gis gzhan gyi'i tsha ba la gnod par mi bya'o// gnod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sdom sa/ rkang med deng ni rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa dang
97b1(1): rkang mangs kyi/ sde nan+d+ra yang dag bsdus pa yin/ rkang med ces bya ba ni sbrul dang / pad+ma dang / srog chags dre'u srin dag go// de dag ni gsum gyis stsogs par
97b2(1): byed de/ sbrul khas sdig pa dag dang / rgyal po'i smad pa dang / kha lungs pa'i ya ban dag gis so// ci ltar sbrul khas sdigs pa dag gis zhe na/ 'di ltar
97b3(1): sbrul khas sdigs pa dge/ sbrul la brten te 'tsho bar byed pa ste/ de ltar sprul khas sdigs pa dag gis so// ji ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag gis she na/ 'di ltar
97b4(1): rgyal po'i smin pa dag pad+ma la brten te 'tsho bar byed de/ de ltar rgyal po'i smin pa dag gis so// ci ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag gis she na/ 'di ltar kha langs pa
97b5(1): ya ba na dag srog chags dre'u srin dag ba ga che brtson par byed/ sa 'byin par byed cing spang la rdo bar byed de/ de dag de 'cha zhing smos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba
97b6(1): rnam pa du ma btung bar byed de/ de ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag gis so// dge slong gis srog chags rkang med dag rku bar byed na/ srog chags rkang med dag gi rI na
97b7(1): zang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/ dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// rkang gnyis shes bya ba ni mi rnams dang kha cig go/ ma rnam
97b8(1): ni rnam bu gsum gyis rku ste/ yul phyogs dang brda dang mtshan mas so// ci ltar yul phyogs kyi shi na/ gang gi tshe kho bo bskyed mos tshal lam/ 'dun sa 'am/ 
98a1(1): gnas che ge mo zhig tu mthong ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis bya ba de smras par shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/ de ltar yul phyogs kyis so// 
98a2(1): tsa ltar brdas she na gang gi tshe kho bo snga dro 'am gung tshogs sam/ phyed reng mthong ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par bgyis shig ces bya ba ste/ de lta
98a3(1): brjes so// tsaM ltar mtshan mas shen gang gi tshe mgo'i skra dang kha spu bregs nas ring bar ma lon pa 'am snam sbyar dmar ser ram/ sha nye'i dbyar mad ba kyis klan pa'i
98a4(1): lhung bzed dam/ khar bsrubs can nam/ zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/ 'bru ram gyi lhung bzed dam/ sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/ bu ram dbu pa'i lhung bzed
98a5(1): thogs par mthong ba de'i tshe/ khyad kyi bya bde byas par shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/ de ltar mtshan mas so// dge slong gis mi rgyu bar byed na/ mo'i rin zang
98a6(1): bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// bya ni rnam pa gnyis kyis rku ste sbar ba dang mngon sum du babs pas so// 
98a7(1): ci ltar sar pas she na 'di ltar dge slong gis bya sar te rku bar byed na/ bya'i rin zang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po chang na pham par 'gyur la/ dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa
98a8(1): sbom por 'gyur te/ de ltar sbar bas ci ltar mngon sum du babs she na 'di ltar bya ba 'am/ bya ba'i slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bya drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang chud gzan
98b1(1): pa'i phyir dang / tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir nags mas byar gyur cing de bya ba cig tu bas khyab cing 'khrugs par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams kyi 'chags
98b2(1): dag tu ba bas sam/ dang ra dag gam/ sgo gang dag tu babs par gyur pa na/ dge slong gis de ltar 'babs pa'i bya rku bar byed na/ phya'i r-i ni zad partsi bar bya zhing
98b3(1): dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te de ltar mngon sum du babs pas so// 'aldan lung rnam par 'byed pa/ dum bu dang po
98b4(1): bam po drug pa// rkang bzhi zhes bya ba ni glang po che dang / rta dang rnga ma dang ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ri dgas dang / ma he dang / phag dag
98b5(1): de dag ni rnam pa gnyis kyis sku ste/ khyu nas dgar ba dang / brtod pas so// ci ltar khyu nas dgar bas zhe na/ dge slong gis glang po che khyu nas dgar bas rku bar
98b6(1): byed na/ ci srid mig sngar snang ba de srid du nyes pa sbom por 'gyur la/ mig sngar mi snang bar gyur na brkus par brjod par bya ste/ ran zang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos
98b7(1): po tshang nanyes pa pham par 'gyur la/ dngos po mtshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te/ de ltar khyu nas dkar bas so// ci ltar brjod pas she na/ dge slong gis glang
98b8(1): po che rtod pa sna tshogs shing ljon pa 'am/ rtsig pa 'am gzhan dag la rtod par byed na/ ci srid mig sngar snang ba de srid du nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mig sngar
99a1(1): mi sdang bar gyur na brkus par brjod par bya ste/ rin zang rtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang ngan pham par 'gyur la/ dngos po tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur
99a2(1): de ltar brtad pas so// glang po che la ci lta ba bzhin du rta las stsogs pa rkang bzhi pa lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no// rkang mangs shes bya ba ni grog mo dang / phye ma le ba
99a3(1): dang / til dang / phub ma dang rul pa za ba dang / sdig pa dang / tram bu ka dang / tre'i la ta dag go/ de dag ni gsum gyis stsogs par byed de/ gnod du byed pa dang / grong
99a4(1): khyer bsrung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag dang / rgya mtsho'i tshe dag gis so// tsa ltar gnod byed dag gis sha na/ 'di ltar gnod byed dag gos srog chags rkang mangs
99a5(1): ngag gis bum pa sa btang ba ste 'jog par byed cing de dag gis gang gi tshe chad pas bcad pa dag khrid de/ de dag gi rkang pa 'am/ lag pa bum pa de dag gi nang du 'dzud
99a6(1): bar byed cung / de dag de dag gi zin pa na myur du dpya dang / gsum mang po 'jal bar byed de/ de ltar gnod byed pa dag gis so// tsaltar grong khyer srung ba'i sde chen po la gau ti
99a7(1): bdag gos she na/ 'di ltar grong khyer sring ba'i sde chen po la gtogs pa dag gis srog chags rkang mangs dag gis bum pa sa ma btang ba bkang ste 'jog par byed cing de
99a8(1): ngag gis gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dpung 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ de dang lhan cig g.yul srid par byed pa na/ gal te de dag gis 'joms par nus na/ de lta ni legs/ gal te me
99b1(1): nus na srog chags rkang mangs dag gis bkang ba'i bum pa so ma btang ba ra ba ga la gnas pa 'phen par byed cing de dag srog chags rkang mangs dag gis zin pa 'byer
99b2(1): bar gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis so// tsa ltar rgya mtsho'i tshing pa dag gis she na/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong ba dag gis srog
99b3(1): chags rkang mangs dag gis bum pa so mi btang ba bkang ste/ rgya mtsho'i grwa sbyar nas nor bsgrub pa dag rgya mtsho chen po rgal ba na de dag la chom rkun pa rtags mtshan
99b4(1): sngon po 'am nag po can 'ong zhing gru 'jomos par byed pa na tshong pa dag gis de dag gis de dog dang lhan cig gi yul sprod par byed pa na gal te de dag gis 'joms
99b5(1): par byed nus na de lta na lags/ gal te mi nus na srog chags rkang mangs dag gis bkang ba'i bum pa so ma btang ba 'phen par byed cing de dag srog chags rkang mangs
99b6(1): dag gis zin pa na 'byer bar byed par 'gyur te/ de ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis dge slong gis srog chags rkang mangs dag rku bar byed na/ srog chags rkang mangs
99b7(1): dag gi rIn zang rtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang ni pham par 'gyur la/ dngos po mchod na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// snom la/ gdul pa dang ni bag rdungs can// snum
99b8(1): sbyar re shig dus dang ni// mtshams bzangs dang ni nor gyis yin// rang gi shes pas lhung bzed lon// mi 'pham dang na zla ba sbas// bdag nyid su na'i byin
100a1(1): rku ba yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyis tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yon
100a2(1): na dge slong gdol pa dang / bag rdzangs can zhes bya ba gta mo 'dre ba phebs par smra ba 'grogs pa shes smon 'drin gnas skabs mnyam par spyod pa gnyis shig 'khod do// de la
100a3(1): rdol ba ni grags pa bsod nams che ba yin mod kyi lus chung ste/ de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags lhogs pa dag yod do// ba ga rdzangs
100a4(1): can ni lus che ba yin mod kyi grags pa dang / bsod nams chung ste chos gos gsum lhung bzed len cing de'i chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su stengs pa yin no// 
100a5(1): dge slong bag rdzangs can la smrab pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod te bor 'dod pa chung bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir bdag nyid gcer bur ston par byed cing rnyed pas sam ma rnyed pas/ bag rdzangs
100a6(1): can gyis smras pa/ ma snyed pas so// ci'i phyir sbyor mi 'dzud/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun spangs te/ su zhig kho bo la sbyin par byed/ dge slong gdol pa de khyod kyi gtam
100a7(1): 'dre ba/ phebs par smra ba/ 'grogs bshos smras 'dren yin pa de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rigs lhag pa dag yod la ci'i phyir de la
100a8(1): slongs pag rdzangs kyis sbas pa/ ma ster ro// tso khyod kyis lan 'ga' ying bslangs sam/ lan 'ga' yang ma bslangs// tsi tshwa'i sgra kho nas lham dga' thud par byed dam
100b1(1): sang la song shig dang ster ro// bag rdzangs can de dag gis spro bar byas nas gdas pa'i gan du song ba dang / gdol pa med nas/ ba ga rdzangs can gyis gdal pa ni lus chung
100b2(1): ba yin pas/ je 'di'i chos gos gzhal bar bya ste/ gal te bdag gis lus kyi chad du 'gyur na bslang bar bya'o/ gal te ma'i gyur na/ tsa'i phyir de dri mar grang du bzhug
100b3(1): par bya snyam du bsams nas/ bag rdzangs can gdol pa'i gnas khang du zhugs te/ sna ma sbyar blta bar brtsams pa dang / tsa tse man chos gos kyi gdang lha sbyar dmar ser
100b4(1): 'dug pa mthong nas/ bag rdzangs can gyis phog ste/ gyon zhing bsnyams nis/ ngos nas ngos la rtog par byed pa na/ gdol pa 'ongs te mthong ma thag tu smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
100b5(1): pa khyod kyis snam sbyar 'di rku sems kyis blangs so// ba ga rdzangs can gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos rku sems kyis ma blangs te/ 'di ltar kho bo la gdol pa ni lung
100b6(1): chung ba yin pas/ je 'di'i chos gos gzhal bar bya ste/ gal te bdag gi lus kyi tshad du 'gyur na/ bslang bar bya'i/ gal te mi 'gyur na yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya
100b7(1): snyam pa'i blo skyes so// gdol pas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir gzhan nas gzhan du 'phro bar byed/ khyed kyis rku sems kyis blangs pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung
100b8(1): ba byung ngo // bag rdzangs can bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam/ snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod do// dge slong rnams kyis bcom
101a1(1): ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ci lta bus rnam sbyar de bgos/ 
101a2(1): bag rdzangs can gyis ci ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong dpyod pa'i bsam pa can 'di la ni
101a3(1): ltung ba med de/ yang dge slong gis yid bcug pa ma yin pa la yid gcag pa bskyed pa mi bya'o// 'di ltar mdza' ba shes ni gsum ste/ tha ma dang / 'bring dang chen po'o// / 
101a4(1): de la mdza' bshes tha ma la ni yid bcugs pa chu du bya 'i/ 'azing du yang mi bya/ chen po yang mi bya'o// mdza' shes 'bring la ni yid bcugs pa chu ngu dang 'azing bya'i
101a5(1): chen po mi bya'o// mdza' bshes chen po la ni yidi bcugs pa chu ngu dang 'bring dang / chen po yang bya'o// dge slong gi yid gcugs pa ma yin pa la yid bcugs pa skyed par
101a6(1): byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gnyen yon na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na
101a7(1): dge slong mtshams bzangs dang / nar gyis byon zhes bya ba gtam 'dre ba/ phebs par smra bA 'grogs pa shes/ smras 'drin mtshungs par gnyis shig 'khad do// mtshams
101a8(1): bzangs kyi lhung bzed na mdzes pa gsal ba/ zlum pa longs slod ba pa yin la/ rnar mi sbyin gyi lhung bskyed chung ngu yang mdzes pa gsal ba/ zlum pa longs spyod bzod pa
101b1(1): yin na/ de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na zas kyi bye ba byas te/ 'chags na nyung bzod 'khru ba'i tshe mtshams bzangs kyis nor gyis byin dbang ba'i lhung bzed chu ngurang
101b2(1): gi lhung bzed du bcug ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nor gyis sbyin gang la lhung bzed dang / lhung bzed cu du 'di lta bu gdag de ni snying las chu dus dge ba'i phyogs
101b3(1): spyod par byed de// nor gyis sbyin gyis smra skye ba/ gal te tho ba na khyer cig/ ci tsam dus gzhan na nor gyis sbyin la ri brags shig tu bye ba rung zhig byung nas des
101b4(1): spros pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mtshams bzangs kho bo la ni ri brags shig tu bya ba cung zhig byung na/ gang kho bo'i bya ba de byed pa de la kho bos lhung bzed chu du byin no// / 
101b5(1): mtshams bzangs kyis sbas pa/ sbyin nam sbyin no// za bas yin no// mtshams bzangs tho bas yin no zhes byas nas bdag la gzhi 'dis tshangs par tshangasu spyod pa
101b6(1): rnams mtshams bzangs na gli rngan gyis las byed do zhes zer bar 'gyur ro/ snyam nas 'gyod pa skyes te/ de ma song ngo // ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na mtshams bzings
101b7(1): la ri brag nyid kyi bya ba zhig byung nas des song la de gnyi ga byas te phyir 'ong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ mtshams bzangs seng ste gcig byas nas phyir 'ongs te smras pa
101b8(1): tshe dang ldan pa nor gyis byin khri bo khyod kyi dgos pa de bsgrubs kyis lhung bzed chu ngu byin cig/ nor gyis byin gyis smras pa/ khyod bdag nyid kyis dgos pa la
102a1(1): song ba yin gyi/ kho bo'i dgos pa la song ba ma yin pas/ kho bos mi sbyin no// mtshams bzangs kyis smras pa/ gal te ma sten
102a2(1): na kho bo rang nyid kyis blang bar bya'o// gal te thob na'o// ci tsam na nor gyis byin phyir byung ba de na/ mtshams bzangs kyis lhung bzed chung ngu blangs te/ rang gi
102a3(1): lhung bzed du bcug ste bzhig go/ ci tsam nor gyis byin 'ongs pa na lhung bzed chung ngu ma snang nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i lhang bzed chu du sus
102a4(1): blangs/ mtshams bzangs kyis smras pa/ su dbang bas so// su dbang khaM kho bo dbang ngo // nor gyis byin gyis spros te smras pa/ khyod kyis rku sos
102a5(1): kyis blangs pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byung ngo // mtshams bzangs bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes na
102a6(1): des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod do// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams bzangs
102a7(1): lams pa/ dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ci lta bus lhung bzed chu du de blangs/ des ci ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
102a8(1): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong rang gi 'du shes pas lhung bzed chu du blangs pa 'di la ni ltung ba med de/ yang dge slong gis gla rngan gyi las mi bya
102b1(1): bar 'di ltar lag pod dam/ bsod nams 'dod pas las bya'o// dge slong gis gla rngan gyi las byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom
102b2(1): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong mi 'pham dang / zla bas smras
102b3(1): shes bya ba/ gtam 'dra ba/ phebs par sla ba/ 'grogs pashis smos 'drin gcis shig 'khod de/ zla bas sras na grags pa bsod nams che ba yin te
102b4(1): de la lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang ska rags lhag pa dag yod do// ma'i pha ma ni grags pa dang bsod nams chung ste/ chos gos
102b5(1): gsum lhur len cing de'i chos gos gsum gsum ngan tsang snam sbyar yang yongasu sbyangs pa yin no// dge slong rnams kyis ma'i 'pha ma la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
102b6(1): khyod te bor 'dod pa chung bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir bdag nyid gcer bur ston par byed pa ci snyed pas sem ma rnyed pas/ mi 'pham gyis smras pa/ ma rnyed pas so// 
102b7(1): ci'i phyir sbyor mi mdzad/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun spangs te sa zhig kho bo la sbyin par byed/ dge slong zla bas khyod kyis gtam 'dre ba/ phe
102b8(1): bar smra ga/ 'grogs pashes spros 'dren yin la/ de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang / dra ba dang / bor bu dang / ska rigs lhag pa dag yod na/ 
103a1(1): ci'i phyir de la mi slong / mi 'pham gyis smras pa/ mi ster ro// ci khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' bslangs sam/ lan 'ba'
103a2(1): ma bslang so// ci chu'i sgra kho nas lham dag 'bud par byed dam/ song la slongs shig ster ro// ma'i 'pham de dge slong de dag gis spro bar byas nas/ zla bas
103a3(1): sras kyi gan du song ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa zla bas bdag la lhung bzed byin cig/ zla bas smras kyis sbas pa mi sbyin no// mi 'pham gyis smras pa/ 
103a4(1): gal te lhung bzed mi sbyin na chos gos byin cig/ zla ba sngas kyis smras pa/ ci kho bo khyod kyis khyim bdag mgo reg tu mthong ngam/ khyod la kha tshar
103a5(1): yang yongasu mi gtong na/ chos gos lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mi'i pham gyis spyos te kho bo 'di'i 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin na/ 
103a6(1): 'di skad ces kha tshar yang khyod la yongasu mi btang na/ chos gos lta smos kyang ci dgos shes zer ro snyam du bsams nas/ mi 'pham gyis smras pa
103a7(1): dang gos thams cad ma 'phrogs na/ mi 'pham zhes bya ba'i med mi bzung ngo zhes mi 'phye ma de nam zhig na 'di'i chos gos drug brku bar bya snyam du skabs
103a8(1): tshol zhing / de ltung len bzhin du sdong ngo // ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na zla ba sbas la btso blag gi las nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang / mi 'jam
103b1(1): zla ba sbas kyis drung du song ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa zla ba smras kho bos kyang grogs bya'o// zla ba slas kyis smras pa/ mnyes kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ ma
103b2(1): 'pham de zla ba sbas kyis chos gos dag 'tshed par byed byi dor byed/ 'dren par bzlog cing rtog par byed do// zla ba sras kyis 'di ltar 'di ltar lta bas
103b3(1): bdag gi chos gos dag bzlog tsang rtog par byed pa las na gdon mi za bar bdag gi chos gos 'di dag rku bar byed do snyam du bsams nas/ zla bas
103b4(1): dogs pa dang bcas pas/ chos gos dag kha bsgyur nas gtur bur bcug ste/ de dag sngas su bcug nis nyal lo// dge slong dag nam gyi chu stod
103b5(1): dang nam gyi cha smad la mnyel bar sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par spyod pas/ mi 'pham gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa zla ba sras tshur shog/ dge ba
103b6(1): phyogs byed du 'dong / zla bas sras kyis smras pa khyod seng shig/ kho bo ngal ba phyi bzhin rung ngo // mi'i pha me tshe dang ldan pa shog shig ces zer te
103b7(1): phyir byung ngo // zla ba sras kyis gal te 'gran no chos gos ngag rlag par 'gyur ro// 'on te mi 'gran ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongasu nyams par 'gyur na
103b8(1): gong gi sbyor bdag gi chos gos dag kyang brlag par mi 'gyur la/ dge bo'i phyogs kyang yongasu mi nyams par 'gyur ba'i thabs tsa yid snyam du sa
104a1(1): shing rig nas/ bdag nyid kyi gtur bu mi 'pham gyi sngas su bcug ste/ mi 'pham dbang ba'i gtur bu bdag nyid kyi sngas su
104a2(1): bcug nas nyal lo// dge slong dag gis nam gyi cha smad la kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / zla ba sbas kyis mi 'pham la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ma'i 'pham
104a3(1): longs la dge ba spyod cig/ mi 'pham gyis smras pa/ kho bos dge ba'i phyogs byas zin gyis/ da khyod song la dge ba'i phyogs spyod cig/ kho bo ngal ba
104a4(1): ngal sos so zhes zla ba sras dge ba'i phyogs kyi ched du song so// mi 'pha ma re shig dus ni snang na lam gyi dus yin nam ma yin snyam du bsems nas/ dus bzang
104a5(1): po mthong ba dang / des zla ba sras kyi snga nas/ bdag nyid kyi gdur bu khyer te song ngo // ci tsam na mtshan mo nam langs par gyur pa dang / des rje shig chos ci'ang

104a8(1): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ste/ gal te bskal pa yang yod par gyur na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du tshangs par spyod par spyad par bya'o// 'on te skal ba med na
104b1(1): ni phyir 'babs sa snyam du bsams nas/ de bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ngo // de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis mdun na chos
104b2(1): ston pa'i phyir bzhugs shing chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mi'i pham thag ring po kha nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la
104b3(1): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis zag ring po kho nas 'ong ba'i dge slong mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo // dge slong dag mi 'pham par mi 'gyur ba'i gti mug can
104b4(1): 'di ni rang gi chos rung cing dag nyes pa sbom por ltung ngo // dge sbyong dag da ltar rku sems la ni nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod pas/ de'i phyir dge slong gis
104b5(1): rga sems kyis rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang blang bar mi bya'o// dge slong gis rku sems kyis rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos len na nyes pa sbom por
104b6(1): 'gyur ro// skom la/ snam sbyar 'phyar bar gyur pa dang / bag ma phyir 'bru mar slong ba dang / khyim bdag bu dang tsha bo dang / lha'i bangs pa len da'i bu
104b7(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong ma shar nas skyes
104b8(1): pa dang / lho nas skyes pa gnyis shig 'dug ste/ shar nas skyes pa ni mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma yin/ lho nas skyes pa ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma yin// 
105a1(1): de gnyis la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing spyan sngar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te

105a3(1): 'dun du 'gro ba de'i snam sbyar phrag pa la gyon pa 'phyang bar gyur nas/ lho nas skyes pa phyi bzhin 'ongs pas smras pa/ 'phags ma a ba sa tha a bzu/ shar nas skyes pa
105a4(1): de chos kyi shugs thob pas mi sems pas snam sbyar nas/ lho nas skyes pas blangs te/ des 'di ltar bdag gis bul na/ 'phags ma'i dge ba'i phyogasu yongasu
105a5(1): nyam par 'gyur bas/ dbyar khang du phyin nas dbul bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ de gnyis dbyar khang du song ba dang / shar nas skyes pa myur ba myur ba kho
105a6(1): nar btsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas/ bcug lag khang du zhugs te// skyil mo krung pyod kyis 'dug go/ lho nos skyes pa sa gal te
105a7(1): phul na nyes dmigs de kho na bstabs par 'gyur ba se/ shig phyis langs pa la dbul lo snyam du bsams nas/ des snum sbyar de rang gyi gnas khang du khyer te/ 
105a8(1): chos gos kyi rdang la zhag/ ci tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig tshan mo nam langs pa dang / shar nas skyes pas smras pa/ gzhon nu mi snam sbyar khyer shog/ bsod snyoms
105b1(1): 'phrul/ gzhon nu me gan pa'ang du zhugs te/ chas gos kyi gdungal bltas pa dang / snum sbyar ma mthong nas/ ngas smras pa/ 'phags ma snyam sbyar
105b2(1): ma mchis so// shar nas skyes pas smras pa/ lho nas skyes pa'i gnas khang ltos shig/ gzhon nu ma de lnga nas skyes pa'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / chos gos kyi gdang le snum
105b3(1): sbyar bzhag pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sus 'phags ma'i snam sbyar 'di 'dir khyer du snyam du sems so// lho nas skyes pas thos nas/ des smras pa/ kho mos khyer te
105b4(1): 'ongs so// ci'i phyir lho nas skyes pas ci ltar gyur pa de la go bar byas so// dge sbyong ma de de la nang dung bcas pas/ gshe zhing smras pa/ khyed kyis rku sems kyis rang gi gnas
105b5(1): khang du bcug ste/ gzhag pas khyed la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo // lho nas skyes pa'i dge slong ma bdag la yang dag par kho nar pham par gyur pa ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod
105b6(1): paskyes nas/ des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
105b7(1): dge slong ma de la smras pa/ dge slong ma khyod kyis a ba sa tha zhes brjod pa'i tsa'i tha tshig/ btsun pa yul dbul na na ba dang lhung ba gang lags pa de la bdag cag a
105b8(1): bas tha zhes mtsho'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong ma 'di le ni skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang / ljongs
106a1(1): kyings pa'i tshigags ltung ba ba gyi/ lon kyang nas dmigs gang yin pa thams cang mnan gyi dngos po ltung ba yun ring du 'a
106a2(1): ba las gyur pa yin pas/ de lta bas na dge slong dmangs slong mas gzhan gyi dngos po ltung ba yun ring du bcang bar mi bya ste/ 'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ 
106a3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ngam gzhan gyi dngos po ltung ba yun ring du bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ drug slong zhig gis gzhan gyi dngos po ltung ba mthong
106a4(1): nas/ 'di dge slong che ge mo zhig gi yin no zhes ngo shes nas/ de dge slong gi gnas khang du song ste/ dal bu si khod kyis sgro gtan la brdungs pa dang / dge slong de
106a5(1): ting nge 'dzin las langs te smras pa/ 'di su des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis dngos po ltung ba la 'di kho bos mthong gis long shig/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa la/ 
106a6(1): bo la dngos po de ma byin pa len pa dag gis brkus par gyur pa ri bla'i/ kho bo khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma bzang po 'di 'dra ba las bslang ba rim yin ro// 
106a7(1): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong zhig gis gzhan gyi dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba myed de/ 
106a8(1): yang dge slong gos dge sbyong de'i phyir ting nge 'dzir las bskyang bar mi bya bar 'di ltar de'i mngon sum du gzar dgul btags te bzhag par bya'o// dge slong zhigags gro zhan gyis
106a9(1): la ga 'dzi sa nga tshas par mabyibasas/ snye du myong la skyes nas/ des zhems dzi po mas
106b1(1): dngas pa ltung ba mthang ma/ des 'di dag sdang dag ma nag ga yin no zhes ngags nus ngas pa khyer te/ dag srung de'i drung du sang sa/ tshe dang ldan bldadu kyi dngos pa
106b2(1): ltung ba 'di kho bos mthong gis long shig/ dge slong de la nang dang bcas pa yin pas smras pa/ rwa dang ldan pa khyod kyis 'di ltung ba mthong ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar khyo

106b4(1): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med med kyi 'on
106b5(1): dge slong gis dge slong gi yo byed ltung ba mthong na/ dge skos kyis kyang nyi ma gnyis sam// gsum du dge 'dun brim par bya zhing gal te ngo shes pa yin na/

106b7(1): ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong ma rim zhes bya ba dgra bcom pa/ rnam par rgyal bar bya ba las rnam par rgyal ba zhig 'dug pa de la/ spos 'tshong ga
106b8(1): khye'u zhig mngon par dad par gyur ras de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags ma khyod la tsaSh+maN+Dal ba/ de'i slad du bka' stsol gtsag dang / thams cad bsgrul
107a1(1): par brgya'o zhes yo byad thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa dang / des kyang bzhin bzangs a rog kyang de ltar bya'o zhes dang

107a6(1): du bya'o zhes smras te dong ngo // des de bzhin lan gsum gyi bar du bstabs pa dang / de ni gzhon nu ma zhig spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di yang dang yang du stobs
107a7(1): bor byed na/ ci yang dag par stobs pas stobs par byed dam/ 'on te rtobs pas stobs par byed pa bgram par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/

110a2(1): kyang 'phags pa ma'u 'gal ste blo chen po'i drung chu khang do snyam du shes nas gal te khye'u dga' zlog par nus nan/ bdag cag gyu dro ba'i bar gyi mtsho ba yang la ston nus na rgyan rnam
110a3(1): bya ste/ des kyang bdag cag btsal ma dgos par la skar dri longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur ro snyam du blo skye so// de dag brda byas ste lam du dong nas 'khor pa dang / khye'u de dag kyang rgyan
110a4(1): thams cad kyis klubs te 'ongs nas/ chom rkun pa de dag gis khye'u de dag khyer ro// khye'u de dag go phye bzhin khye'u mngag zhugs pa dag 'dong ba de dag gis chom rkun dag gis rkus
110a5(1): pa mthong nas/ de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du brgyugs te sman pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi sras bu dag ston zla ba chungs kyi g.yon sa na dag gis rkus thabs dgongs shog/ khyim
110a6(1): bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgyugs te/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song nas/ smras pa/ lha bdag gi bu dag storan zla tha rlungs kyi g.yon can dag gas 'phrogs kyis/ 
110a7(1): bu slongs ma stsal du gas la/ rgyal pags la rgyal bu gzhan nu 'a phags skyes pa'i bsgob/ song la khyim bdag sa bu rnams dang / rlom rkun pa dag myur du khrug nag/ 'phags skyes
110a8(1): bai na rang gnas/ khyim pa namaman mang pas skyen du/ nang dang bcas par gyur bas/ di mang la ma ming ngo // de nas kyi yang dag tshe dang ldan pa mthu 'ga' ma
110b1(1): bol mngon par dad pa dag gis tshe dang ldan pa ma'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzad cig/ khyod kyi na gnas dag stan
110b2(1): zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag gis phrogs kyis brtson par mdzad du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pas de khye'u dag lam bsams re shig/ khye'u dag pa
110b3(1): ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing pha ma dag kyang bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/ ma dad pa dag gis
110b4(1): kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing / dad pa rnams kyang 'di ltar dong ngo chog ston zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag gis phrogs par byed na/ phyin can su zhig rgyal byed kyi rnal

110b6(1): skyes po'i dpung mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bzhir rnga pa ti ha brdungs pa dang / ston zla tha rgyangs kyi g.yon can dag gis/ shes ldan dag bdag cag dmag dper 'phags skyes pa
110b7(1): phyogs bzhi nas paskor gyis zin par gyur na mi rung gis/ bor la 'dod ngo snyam du bsams nas/ de dag gis khye'u de dag bor te byer ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u tha gal gyi bu

111a1(1): 'gal gyi bu chen po smras pa/ khye'u dag khyed cag gar 'dong / 'phags pa bdag cag ston zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag gis brkus so// 'on

111a8(1): chen po'o// 'phags skyes pos des 'di dag thar bar byas kyi gzhan su zhig nus snyam du bsams shing rig nas/ yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas bdag gis yul na
111b1(1): 'phags pa de lta bu rdzu 'phrul che ba de ltar mthu che ba che 'di'i don dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i don la skyabs mdzad par zhugs pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed na/ 
111b2(1): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do// de sngags pa brjod cing mnyan yod du 'jug pan drug sde dag kyang phyir 'byung rnying drug sde dag gis sku
111b3(1): pa/ khyod su'i bsngags pa brjod/ 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ khyed kyi'o// nged kyis ci byas/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bde/ 
111b4(1): 'gon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag ston zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar par byas so// bkren dag kho bo cag de na yang 'on kyang 'di na la la byi bo gcer

119b6(1): pas bla gcor gyi sgras dge slong dag gi sems rtse gcig pa nyid mi 'grub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ci snyed padag gis las 'grub pa de snyed 'jus par bya'i/ thams cad mi bya'o// 
119b7(1): dge slong dag gis de dag thams cad la zas dang gos sbyin par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag las byed pa de dag la zas dang gos sbyin par bya'i thams cad la mi bya'o// 
119b8(1): dge slong rnams kyis de dag na ba yal bar blo nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag na bde dag la zas dang gos sbyin par bya zhing bsnyen bkur yang bya'o// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na nyer dga'
120a1(1): dge gas byed pas lnga 'bangs de dag la smras bzhin bzangs dag za za dge skos byed kyis khyed cag nang par snang sheg shig/ rgyal po'i bab na kun tu spyod pa sngon zlas
120a2(1): kyigayon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag 'khod de/ de dag dgag dbye byas ma thag tu shes ldan dag bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na/ des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar gnas par 'gyur zhes
120a3(1): phan tshun gros byed/ de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa gcig 'dug pa des smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag gi g.yog gang dag grong khyer gyi phyi rol na 'khod pa de dag gzhom par bya'o// gzhan dag gis smras pa
120a4(1): re shig de dag gi jo bo gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sgo 'phang ba dz+ra snyed zla ba skyes kyang lto khengs pa grub par dka' bas de dag la yang cung zad med na de dag gi g.yog dgal lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong gi rgyus
120a5(1): shes pa des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed mi shes te/ de dag ni zan gzhan las za zhing rang gi las rjes sgrub pa de ltar len te/ thabs du mdag gis nor smrab par byed pas/ de dag la gang yod pa de ni grong khyer 'di na me

120a7(1): skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyed kyi nam ring bdag ston zla ba chungs kyi g.yon can dag gis 'jams par 'gyur gyis 'gron pa mdzad du gsol// tshe dang ldan pa po li/ 
120a8(1): da'i bus gal te g.yog dag lam bsams na g.yog dag kyang re shig nor dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur lam dad pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing

120b4(1): gi yang rkun rdzas blangs pa dang / lcags kyi ra ba de yang phyir byung ste/ lan bdun gyi bar du de dag ltar gyur pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba 'ga'

120b8(1): ste gnyid log pa na lha des de dag gi rmi lam du sbran pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag sngon zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag gis ma bcom pa 'di thams cad ni 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i mthu yin no// 
122a1(1): ltung ba ma mthung ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyid de/ nen du ldan pa na me spang ngoganas pa nas tha ma 'jam par 'gyur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thamamacan
122a2(1): mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ mabyed pa smos byed ga la bla na med pa'i mnga' smras pa/ the tshom thams cad na cad par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i gan du dngas/ don 'di 'us shig dang / bcom ldan 'das

122b3(1): na gzugs pa ni yid las byung ba ma tshang ba med pa dbang po ma rnams pa yan lagadang ning lag thams cad dang ldan pa bzang ba kha dog dang ldan pa rang las 'ad 'byung ba/ rnamakha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba

189a3(1): cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dgra gis phan tshun smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa drag 'di gcig pu phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing 'dug nA/ yu bu cag las sus kyang 'di/

189a5(1): yang de skad gzhan dag kyang de skad zer te/ thams cad kyis de skad smras so// de nas bcu drug po de dgra gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ dag cag gi 'bral

189a7(1): 'gyur gyis/ zas zos ma thag tu bzod pa gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis zas zos nas/ bzod pa gsol bar bsams ste/ gzhon pa rnams kyis
189a8(1): ni rkang pa gnyis la btugs/ rgan pa rnams kyis ni mgul nas khyud de tshe dang ldan pa bzod par gsol zhes byas na/ des cad mi smra ba nyid du 'dug
189b1(1): go de dag ches bshes pa gcig yod pa des ga ga tshilta byas pa dang / des dgod par brtsams te bzod do zhes kyang zer ro// de dag gris bsams pa//

189b3(1): ste dus la bab bo// de dag btsud cing mya ngan bya bar ba rnams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye bcu bdun ste dag ci'i phyir brtan cing mya ngan byed/ de dag gis smras
189b4(1): ga bdag cag sngon ni bcu bdun sder gyur nad ni bcu drug sder gyur te/ tshangs pa mtshungs pa'i spyod pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral zhing pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung ngo // dge
189b5(1): slong dag gis ma legs so zhes smras te dong ngo // bcu drug po de dag kyang mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa/ dge slong gzhan dag gi sa mthong nas/ dag
189b6(1): slong de dag gis skyo ba brtsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa bcu drug sde 'di dag ni sog mi'i me bzhin du skad cig gis 'bar zhing shi bar gyur te/ yud tsam zhig gis rgod bag byed cing
189b7(1): yud cig zhig gis sems khongasu chud de 'khod do// de dag mya ngan gyi mes yid gdungs pas yongasu spyod kyang cang mi sba bar 'khod pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
189b8(1): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong de rnams la ni ltung ba med de yang dge slong gis ga ga tshil mi bya'o// byed na
190a1(1): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// / 'dul ba/ lung rnam par 'byed pa/ dum bu dang po// bam po bcu
190a2(1): cig pa// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas skyed kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//

190a4(1): can yin pas/ des dge 'dun la bsngos te gtsug lag khang rta babs mthun po dang / skar kung dang skor khung dra ba can dang lan kan gyis brgyan pa/ snying dang mig 'phrog
190a5(1): pa/ mtho ris kyi spris su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go// gtsug lag khang der dge slong drug bcus dbyar dag byas te dong nas/ khyim bdag des der ma byin par len
190a6(1): pa dag gis khri 'am khri'u dag mi rkus par gyis shig ces bsrungs ma'i mi bzhag go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong drug bcu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der
190a7(1): phyin nas bsti gnas rnyed par byed na mi zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang du mi gnas/ bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ga la
190a8(1): yod/ 'phags pa dag dgon pa 'di na'o// dge slong de dag der dong ba dang / srungs ma'i mis mthong nas/ des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen bkur
190b1(1): byas te/ gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba la sogs pa dag phul te/ sbyangs tshags byin nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag re

190b3(1): spyod kyi gtsug lag khang du dge slong glo bur du lhag pa drug bcu mchis so// khyim bdag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas nang mi dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag
190b4(1): bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong gi dge 'dun byon pa de dag legs par spyad pa'i btung bas tshim par byas/ bu ram dang hwags dang / ling kha ra dang / rgun dang bal po/ 
190b5(1): se'u bong shig ces khyim des legs par sbyang ba'i btung ba sbyar nas/ gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / dge slong dag kyang chu btsags/ rang rang gi spyod lam dag
190b6(1): gis 'khod do// khyim bdag des dge slong de dag thag ring po nas mthong ste/ des gtsug lag khang de 'tsho ba dmas pa gang ba bzhin du mthong nas/ rgya cher dad pa'i shug+sas
190b7(1): kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyud kyis tshig su bcad pa smras pa/ grong ngam yang na dgon pa yang rung // shod ngam yang na thang yang rung // gang na 'ongs pa gnas pa'i/ sa bzhi de ni
190b8(1): rga byed yin// de nas legs par spyad pa'i btung ba sta gon byas te rang gi lag pa nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de tshim par byas nas/ rang nyid kyis pog por thogs

191a7(1): mnyan yod na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing / dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas/ che ge me zhig
191a8(1): gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar grub po zhes shes pa brda' spyod dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin du dad/ btsun mo 'phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs
191a9(1): khyim bdag cid rgan pa'i mtha' log su 'dug ste/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis gtsug lig khang 'od bdag nyid kyi sla du yang bgyid du ma stsal/ nyi du rnas kyi srad tu yA bgyi du ma stsol gyi/

192a1(1): de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do// ri brags de na yang gtsug lag khang

192b8(1): des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dri bar brtsams pa/ 'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ras kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags//

193a5(1): g.yon can de'i lag nas bzung na ste/ gnas khang du cug nas smras pa/ bzhin bzings gos kyi rnga gos phur shog cing 'dug pa la ltos/ 'phags pa ci khyod kyis lags sam/

196a4(1): 'am/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag gang gi slad du byon pa legaso zhes/ khyim bdag des yang rgya cher gus pa dang bcas pas mkhos phab ste/ dge slong re re
196a5(1): la yang yo byad bcu gsum phul lo// chom rkun pa de dag yang phyir 'ongs te gtsug lag khang gi sgo rdungs par byed pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis sbas pa/ 
196a6(1): tshe dang ldan pa dag g.yo can de dag nyid lhags kyi tshem ngam gyis shig ces 'ag ni de long shig/ 'ag ni de'i thu'u dang dus kyi 'khor lo dang / snam sbyar dang bdun
196a7(1): dang / lnga dang / gtur bu dang / rgya cang dang / shur bu dang / lpags po dang / shur bu phre'u 'on rjes tsham dam bya bar brtsams pa dang / g.yon can de dag
196a8(1): skrag ste 'byer bar brtsams pa na/ lhas tshigs su bcad pa sbas pa// legs gsungs rkang gnyis gtso bo thub pa yis// nyan thos rnams kyi tsham
196b1(1): dam gang bstan pa// tsham dam rab brtson pa drag mchog yin gyi// g.yon can g.yul la sngar bgo ljon pa// lnga brgya dag ni de lta ma yin no// g.yon can de dag
196b2(1): la dge slong gi rgyus shes pa des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag ci'i phyir 'byer byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyod nyid na re 'di na 'khod pa'i rab tu byu
196b3(1): ba cu po dag na 'pho gA slob dpon sha stag yin po zhes zer bas/ ji ltar mi 'phros su rung / gzhan+da yang bdag cag gi snga 'gan+ti zhes bya ba las
196b4(1): ba'i mtshon de lta bu dag gi ming ni sngon lan 'ga' yang ma thos so// de dag ni mtshon ma yin no// 'o na de dag ci yin/ re shig 'gan+di de zhes bya ba ni de dag gi
196b5(1): gtsang ba'o// 'gan+ti the'u zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi rdung bar byed pa'o// dus kyis 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dus yongasu gcod par byed pa'o// snam sbyar dang / 
196b6(1): bdun pa dang lnga pa zhes bya ba de dag ni chos gos dag gi ming ngo do// gtur bro zhes bya ba de dag ni gang du de dag gzhug pa'o// rgya cang dang / shur bu dang / ljags phor
196b7(1): dang / shur bu phre'u zhes bya ba de dag ni ska rags kyi ming yin gyis/ khyed cag ma sdud par yang phyir 'dod la gzhom par bya'o// zhes smras nas/ de dag yang
196b8(1): phyir log ste/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis ya gad btsugs te 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang / de na rgan zhugs shig me la tse bar bzhag pa des chom rkun
197a1(1): pa'i dmag dpon 'dzegs pa de mthong nas rgan zhugs des bsams pa/ yon can 'di dag ni gang dag gis bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gro
197a2(1): dag phrogs te sgren mar bzhag pa dag yin gyi gal te 'di dag la btang snyoms byas na yang 'di dag gis bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos phrogs te sgren mor
197a3(1): bzhag par 'gyur bas 'di dag bsdigs par bya'o snyam nas/ rgan zhugs des dal bus khad kyis song ste/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de'i mgor 'gan+ti 'phangs
197a4(1): ba dang / de'i glad pa zhom nas/ de bsnun pa drag pos phog pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen nas tshegs chen pos rabs te cung zhig tu song ba dang dus la bab bo// 
197a5(1): rgan zhugs des chom rkun pa zhes ku co'i sgra phyung ba dang / dge sbyong rnams kyis chos nyan pa bcad de khang steng du 'dzeg ste smras pa/ chom rkun pa dag gar dong / 
197a6(1): rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/ phyogs 'dir ya ga btsugs te/ 'dzeg pa na kho bos bsdigs nas 'byer ro// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te byer na legs// 
197a7(1): so zhes de dag babs te/ ji tsam na mtshan mo nam langs pa dang / gtsug lag khang gi nyen kongs sor brtags brtsams te/ chom rkun pa de dag 'jog par
197a8(1): gyur pa'i phyogs de gang yin zhes de dag gis so sor brtags pa na khrag mthong ngo // de dag khrag rjes su dong ba dang / chom rkun pa'i dmig dpon bsad pa
197b1(1): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bslab pa 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ smra bar brtsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag sngon ma bcom gyi/ bdag cag gang
197b2(1): gis pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung bas da ni bcom par gyur to zhes de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra/ 
197b3(1): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/  dge slong dag khyed cag la ni ltung ba med de/ yang dge slong gis ci nas kyang 'di bsnun par khye'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis 'phang bar
197b4(1): mi bya zar 'di ltar 'gro 'am rgyab logs su 'phang bar bya zhing bsdigs pa bskyed pa'i phyir tsham dam bya'o// dge slong gis ci nas kyang bsnun par bya'o snyam pa
197b5(1): de lta bu'i sems kyis 'phen par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal migon med zas sbyin gyi
197b6(1): kun dga' ra na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed// 
197b7(1): dga' mgur spyod par byed/ rtse bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'du
197b8(1): te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de nye du zad par gyur cing nor dang lo// 
198a1(1): spyod kyang zad par gyur/ de'i chung ma yang dus la bab nas des bu la smras pa/ bu kho bo nA rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor sgrub tu 'gro/ 
198a2(1): mi nus kyis rab tu byung du 'gro'o// bus smras pa/ yab gal te de lta na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // bu legs so zhes khye'u khri'u khrid de rgyal byed kyi tshal du sod
198a3(1): nas/ dge slong gi drung du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// dge slong dis smras pa/ khye'u 'di
198a4(1): yang rab tu 'byung ngam/ 'phags pa rab tu 'byung ngo // dge slong de khye'u de 'dod pas de bu dang bcas te rab tu phyung ngo // chos nyid kyis nas rgan pa'i mtha' nas rnyed pa

198a6(1): zil gyis non pa de thams cad thos pa nyung ba las gyur pa lags kyis bzhengs shig dang 'o skol cag gnyis yul gzhan du bzhud la thos pa bzung bar bgyi'o// / 
198a7(1): rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/ bu legs kyis 'dong ngo // zhes de gnyis yul gzhan du dong ngo // 'on kyang gnon pa'i mtha' nyid nas las sru skyo bas de gnyis song
198a8(1): ma thag tu kho nar lasu bskos pa dang / bus rgan zhugs la sbas pa/ yab mnyan yod na la su bsko ba mchis su lags kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos
198b1(1): kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing / dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i

198b8(1): zhugs de yang de bzhin du phul ba dang / rgan zhugs de sa la kha bub du 'gyel nas de'i kha phang los glogs pa'i sas gang ste dus la bab po// bu des dung

199a7(1): pa'i las gang yin pa yang byas la/ pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba gang yin pa yang byung bas/ yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par 'gyur/ 
199a8(1): bas/ da du ba'i rigs so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de
199b1(1): de la ni ltung ba med de/ yang dge slong lam du zhugs pas dge slong lam gyis dub pa la phul bar mi bya'o// ngas dge slong lam du zhugs pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos
199b2(1): dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong lam du zhugs pas dge slong lam gyis dub pa ngal sor gzhug par bya/ chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed dang chu tshags dang

199b4(1): bar bya/ go bzhag par bya/ snod dag byin len byed du bcug nas/ so sor brtag par bya'o// 'on te 'ong mi nus na zan mnos te bsu bar bya'o// dus ma yin na skom
199b5(1): gyis bsu bar bya'o// dge slong lam du zhugs pas kun du spyod pa'i chos ci ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te/ spyod par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// /

200a3(1): gos mang po dag bkru ba shal bya dgos/ kho bo khyim du song ste/ zan zo mi nus kyis tshur shog gos dag khyer te 'dod do// phyir song la zan khyer rta shog shig/

200a5(1): bkru ba shal gyis shig/ khus smras pa de ltar bgyi'o// btso blag mkhan de phyogs gcig tu blos phab ste nyid log go// de spyi ther zhig yin pas de'i mgo la
200a6(1): sbrang bu chags so// ji tsam pa rtsi blag mkhan gyi bu des gos dag bcu bshal byas nas pa'i gan du song ba dang / ba'i mgo la snang bu chags pa mthong nas/

200b1(1): ba zhom nas da de dus la dab pa dang / lha tshigs su bcad pa/ dad+ma za zla zos ldan pa mchog yin gyi// mdza' bo zla zos bral ba de la min// blo gros chu dus sngaH
200b2(1): bra bsad snyam nas// tho ba pa'i klad pa bcom par gyur// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus nu btso blag mkhan gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs pa
200b3(1): 'di nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na gtso blag mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni/ rgan zhugs kyi bu 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis de'i tshe yang pha srog dang phral yang mtsha/

200b7(1): brten cing 'khod do// de dag la rgya mo spyad pa dang spyod pa chen po zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod do// de dag lan 'ga' ni rgya mo spyod pa 'dzud par byed la/ lan 'ga' ni spyod/

202a1(1): / ngag gis rgya mo gnyis ka bcug ste/ nyis brgya lnga bcus ni rgya mo spyod pa bcug/ nyis brgya lnga bcus ni rgya mo spyod pa chen po bcug go// gang dag gis N+Da ma tsu @
202a2(1): nIny+dza rlung du sbal dang / bral ba dang / chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang / 1khri pa la sogs pa mang po dag 'di lnga ste dper na til dang 'bras thug po che dang / rgya shug dang rgya sran la/ sa
202a3(1): ba bzhin du phung po rnam par bzhag go// gang g+his ni rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa chu srin nya'i rigs bong tshong chen po nyal ba zin nas de dag gis de drang
202a4(1): bar brtsams so// de dag gis drangs pa na de bsad nas nye ba gnyis brgya lnga brgya po de dag dang / rgya mo spyod pa chen mo khyer te/ rgyud phyogs su zhugs so// nya ba de dag gri
202a5(1): nya ba nyis brgya lnga bcu po gzhan dag la shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen po dang / bdag cag khyer gyi sa ra mda' log shig ces byas// de dag gis bos nas nya pa nyis brgya la
202a6(1): bcu po bzhin dag kyang lhags te/ de nyid la rub pa dang / dwe nya pa lnga brgya dang rgya mo spyod pa chen mo khyer te/ rgyun phyogs su zhugs nas gzung bar ma nus so// skyabs med pa
202a7(1): de dag gis kun du shes ldan dag rgya ma spyod pa chen mo dang bdag cag khyer gyis grags kyis shig ces ram meda' ba bzlog pa dang / las ma mthong ste lang rdzi dag dang / byugs
202a8(1): rdzi ngadag dang / shing thun dag dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dag dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag dang / gzhan yang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag log nas/ de dag
202b1(1): gi lus smras pa dang / rnam par smras pa dag gis rgya mo ral pa dang rab tu ral ba dang chu srin+da de chu nas skam la phyung ngo // de la bgo bco brgyad dang / mig sum bcu rtsa drug yod
202b2(1): de/ de'i mgo la la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra/ la la niH'i mgo 'dra/ la la ni rnga mo'i mag dang / bong bu'i mgo dang / ba lang gi mgo dang / spre'u'i mgo dang / seng ge'i
202b3(1): mgo dang / stag gi mgo dang / dom gyi mgo dang / dred mo'i mgo dang / gung gi mgo dang / byi la'i mgo dang / ra'i mgo dang / lug gi mgo dang // ma he'i mgo dang / phag
202b4(1): gi mgo dang / khyi'i mgo 'dra'o// kun du chu klung yid 'ong ldan pa'i nya ba lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa'i chu srin nya'i rigs bong chod chen
202b5(1): po zhig rgya mo spyod pa chen mos zin te/ chu nas skam la phyung zhing de la mgo brgya dang / mig sum bcu rtsa drug yod do zhes sgras khyab par gyur to// de thos nas srog chags ba
202b6(1): stong phrag du ma dag chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du lhags te/ kha cig ni ldang ma skyes par gyur/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bar gyur to// rdzogs byed la so
202b7(1): bson pa drug po yangs pa can rten cing gnas pa de dag kyang ltad mo skyes te der lag so// skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang ya mtshan skyes te/ mig tshugs su rtog cing shes ldam
202b8(1): dag 'di'i mgo la la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra la/ de nas rtog par byed/ 'di'i mgo la la ni khyi'i bar mgo 'dra la/ de nas rtog par byed do zhes kyang zer ro// de'i skabs
204a1(1): ba dang mi bde ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin no// ngas chu srin nya'i rigs 'di la rten
204a2(1): te/ gdul bar gyur pa'i rgya mo chen mo drang bar bya/ de'i phyir chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du 'gro'o snyam mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs
204a3(1): la gson cing bzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rjes su thugs brtse bas/ dus dang dus su sems can dmyal bar gyur gshegs
204a4(1): ba dang / dud 'gror rgyu ba dang / yi dgas rgyu ba dang / lhar rgyu ba dang / ljongs rgyu ba dang / chu klung rgyu ba dang / ri rgyu ba dang / dur khrod rgyu ba dang / gtsug lag khang rgyur

204b4(1): ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du semaso// de dag dad pa skyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad/

204b6(1): can sngon ma mthong ba'i nga'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to// snyam du sems so// de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par
204b7(1): gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nyid// 
204b8(1): mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do// gang dag steng logs su dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsi gsum dang / thun byung ba dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul/ 
205a1(1): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med
205a2(1): 'od dang / 'od bsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che dang / mi gdung dang / 
205a3(1): gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed
205a4(1): cing / tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po// brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya// sangs rgyal bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
205a5(1): par bya/ gang zhig rab tu bag yod par// chos 'dul 'di la spyod par 'gyur// skye ba'i 'khor ba spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// zhes bya ba yang smras
205a6(1): so// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams myul nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin du rjes su dong ste/ de la gal te bcom ldan
205a7(1): 'das 'das pa'i dus lung ston par bzhad na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las su lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su
205a8(1): nub par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabra
205b1(1): kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur/ yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub/ 
205b2(1): bar 'gyur/ mir skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni bu sa mor nub par 'gyur/ stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub par
205b3(1): 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/ ltar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur
205b4(1): 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/ bla na med
205b5(1): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba ston par bzhed na ni btsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
205b6(1): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lte bar nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba'i// 
205b7(1): tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung 'gyur te/ de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa/ gnyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no// yang tshig su bcad pa smras pa/ rgal
205b8(1): zal zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa// sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par// rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad// 
206a1(1): gyude skad bstan pa rang thos dus mkhyen nas// thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po// nyan pa'i skye za sa ma nyi ldan rnams la// the tshom skyes pa gsu
206a2(1): tshig brtan pa dang // dam pa dge ba dag gis gsal du gsol// tsha chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// sangs rgyas mgon rnams blo bur 'dzum mi ston// brtan rnams ci slad/ 
206a3(1): 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
206a4(1): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyi/ kun dga'
206a5(1): bo srong la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs bre chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyi/ khyed cig las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs
206a6(1): gcig tu chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces sgo tsog/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
206a7(1): bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyi/ khyed cag lnga
206a8(1): gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig tu chu klung rgyu bar 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig/ 'dul ba lung rnam par 'byed pa/ dum bu dang po// bam
206b1(1): po bcu gakris pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ 
206b2(1): dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs byin pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang / dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags bral ba 'khor 'dod chags za/ 
206b3(1): ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongasu
206b4(1): bskor ba seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yodaspu su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs
206b5(1): kyi yongasu bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ra ba'i tshigs kyis bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i
206b6(1): tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po
206b7(1): ltar blon po'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyi yongs su skor ba/ nyi ma
206b8(1): ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyi yos su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor/ 
207a1(1): khang 'phags skyes po ltar grub 'bum gyi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor ba/ nor sbyin ltar
207a2(1): gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ thag bzangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su
207a3(1): bskor ba tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams shin du dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa mkhrus pa/ chu gter ltar ting de ba/ sprin ltar
207a4(1): chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus
207a5(1): skra rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can can po/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rinar+b+be ni ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang // 
207a6(1): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / mu 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ kun shes ko'u din+ya dang / rlangs pa dang / ming cen dang / 
207a7(1): ma 'gags pa dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang dag
207a8(1): slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/ chu klung yid 'ong ldan ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// 'khor des thag ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
207b1(1): bdun dang bcas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dge sbyong ko'u ta ma ldad mo dang bral lo zhes grag na/ de la yang ltad mo skyes te/ chu srin nya'i rigs
207b2(1): blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs so zhes zer ro// gang dag dad pa dang ldan pa de dag ni/ ma dad pa de dag la shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ltad mo dang bral/ 
207b3(1): ba kho na yin te/ bcom ldan 'das nya'i rigs las brtsams te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos cung zhig ston par bzhed pa gor ma chag go zhes
207b4(1): zer zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so// thub pa ljad mo bral ba'i dgongs ldan pa'i// ltad mo med la skye ngan dro med smra// gzhan phan de la gzhol ba'i rgyal po 'di// 
207b5(1): lus can phan phyir nges par 'dir gshegaso// de nas 'khor des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ 'phral kho na mngon par langs te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'dra
207b6(1): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i yab dang yum dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dang / bla ma dang bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag la mngon par bzhengs par mdzad mdzad pa'i// 
207b7(1): phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor de'i dbus su gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs// bzhugs nas
207b8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis nya pa lnga brgya po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzangs dag re shig khyed cag ni nyes par byas pa'i las byed pa yin te/ des na
208a1(1): da ltar nya pa'i skye gnas dman par skyes shing / khyed cag da ltar drag shul can lag pa khrag gis gos pa/ nyams pa dang rab tu
208a2(1): nyams pa la zhen pa/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog po/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pas 'tsho bar byed de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed cag gi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/ skye ba ni cor
208a3(1): 'gyur/ tshe bri ma ni cir 'gyur de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi ci zhig bgyis bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
208a4(1): stsal pa/ nya dang ru sbal dang sbal pa dang / chu srin byis pa gra song ba dang / nya khri ba la sogs pa chu nas bton pa 'di dag mthong shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
208a5(1): ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin btang bar bgyi'o zhes de dgra gi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i dus kyi 'jug thogs de dag btang ngo // de nas bcom
208a6(1): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas cinas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa/ nya dang ru skal dang / sbal pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / 1khri
208a7(1): kha las sogs pa'i srog chags 'di dag chu ji lta ba bzhin du chu klung yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran
208a8(1): shing mi'i skad brjod par 'gyur la/ nga dang thabs gcig smra bar 'gyur la de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan
208b1(1): 'das kyi ci nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa nya dang rus sbal dang / sbal pa dang / chu srin byis pa bsod dang / nya khri pra la sogs pa'i srog chags de/

208b4(1): bka' stsal pA/ bu khyod ser skya yin nam/ bde bar gshegs pa ser skya lag so// bu khyod la las kyi nye bar spyad pa yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mchis so bu khyod
208b5(1): la ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa yod dam/ bde bar gshegs pa mi chos so// bu khyod kyis lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ngam/ btso
208b6(1): ldan 'das nyams su myong ngo // bu khyod kyi sa dag dang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyam su myong ngam/ bde bar gshegs pa nyams su myong ngo // 'o// 
208b7(1): na khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/ bdag gri ma lags so// de gang du skyes/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o// khyod grung du skyes/ dud 'gror ro// 
208b8(1): ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o// bde bar gshegs pa sems
209a1(1): can dmyal ba rnam su'o// zhes gsol nas du bal zhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dre'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/

209a3(1): par sems ni dad gyis la// dud 'gro'i skye 'dir chags bral zhing // de nas mtho risri 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par byas nas/ 
209a4(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la/ bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdagra med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das
209a5(1): ba ni zhi ba'o zhes tshig sum gyi chos bstan to// de nas 'khor de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ shes ldan drag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas sngon gyi skye ba
209a6(1): zan par byas shing mi'i skad kyang brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig smra bar byed pa 'di su zhig yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsten
209a7(1): bar dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba yin pas/ bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar mi nus kyi/ bdag cag 'phags pa kun dga' bo ga la ba de
209a8(1): song ste phyin nas/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la don de zhu bar bya zhing / 'phags pa kun dga' bos bdag cag la ji skad lung ston par 'gyur ba de kho na du bzung bar bya'o// 
209b1(1): zhes zer ro// de nas 'khor de drag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' brog la ba der srong ste byin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa kun
209b2(1): dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ den sngon gyi skye ba dran par gyis shing / mi'i skud kyang brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig smra bar bgyid
209b3(1): pa 'di su zhig lags/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das nyid la don de zhus shig/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan
209b4(1): 'das rnams ni bsten par dka' ba dang / bzod par dka' ba lags pas/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu ba rngo mi thog go// shes ldan dge khru
209b5(1): bo li yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten par dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba yin pas/ kho bos kyang bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar mi/ 
209b6(1): nus kyi/ 'on kyang khyed kyi don du zhu bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
209b7(1): phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug go// mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
209b8(1): 'das kyi bka' stsal pas/ sngon gyi skye ba dran zhing / mi'i skad kyang brjod par bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig smra bar bgyi ba 'di su zhig lags/ kun dga'
210a1(1): kho 'di ni chu srin nya ba'i rigs yin no// kun dga' bo khyod chu srin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi rgyu las brtsams te chos dang ldan pa'i gtam nyan par
210a2(1): 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu las brtsams te/ dge slong rnams dang / skye bo'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid
210a3(1): bka' stsal par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das las thos nas dge slong rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs drag 'dzin par 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das de ni dus lagaso// bde bar
210a4(1): gshegs pa de ni tus lpagaso// kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la gyis shi ga dang bshad par bya'o// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba bskul pa chen po 'di/

210a6(1): pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ 
210a7(1): de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing / grong khyer bar na sen drang srong smra ba/ ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe grong khyer ba ra na se nA rgyal po ze kri zhes bya
210a8(1): ga rgyal srid 'byor ba rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab mo dang 'thab pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nang khrug yongs su zhi ba chom rkun dang / ma
210b1(1): ge dang / nad dang bral sa lu dang bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed chu bstag
210b2(1): go// de nas shed bu gsang tshig 'dod pa gsang tshig tshol ba zhig yul dbus nas lho lam du song ngo // de na bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol du son pa/ yul
210b3(1): tha dad pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyi ston par gyur pa zhig 'dug ste/ shed bu de bram ze de'i drung du song ste/ phyin nas zhi ba dang spyod lam zhi bas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
210b4(1): mtha' gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bram ze des shed bu de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gi kun du spyod pas smras pa/ kye shed bu grwa las 'ongs ci zhig 'dod// 
210b5(1): gleng bu sa smras pa/ bdag yul dbus nas mchis te mkhan po'i zhabs la srid zhu bgyid par 'tshalo// ci zhig gi phyir rig byed klag pa'i slad du'o// shed bu leg
210b6(1): kyis shig/ de ni bram zes bya ba yin ni// shed bu des bram ze'i drung du rig byed klag par bya bar sems// shed bu rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni 'di yin te/ gang gi tshe ma
210b7(1): klog par gyur pa'i tshe na/ lan 'ga' ni chu ngogs su nye byed du 'dong ngo // lan 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'dod do// lan 'ga' ni yams shing thur 'dod do// ji tsam du
210b8(1): gzhan zhig na de dag mi klog par gyur nas/ de'i tshe de dag yam sreg shing thur 'dod pa dang / de dag lam gyi bar skabs kyi gtam brjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/ kye
211a1(1): / kung sa'i rigs dag/ pad sa'i rigs dag/ shan di la'i rigs dag/ ba ra dA tsa'i rigs dag/ lnga pa'i rigs dag/ nye lnga'i rigs dag/ 
211a2(1): rje khyed cag las gang ni yul ga las 'ongs pa dri bar bya'o// de na shed bu gcig gis smras pa/ kho bo ni yul shaR+Sha nas so// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho dwa ni phyogs
211a3(1): nas so// yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ khro ba ni nub kyi sa nas so// yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kha bo ni byang lam nas so// shed bu des smras pa/ kho bo ni
211a4(1): yul dbus nas so// de dag gis smras bshes ldan dag bdag cag gis yul thams cad mthong zhing thos nA yul dbus ni ma mthong ma thos so// sha rarA na blo can
211a5(1): gnas pa ste/ lho na mA na ni g.yon byed 'dug/ nub kyi yul na phra ma can// byang lam na ni tshig rtsub po// zhe sde tshigs su bcad pa yang smras so// de nas dris pa/ 
211a6(1): shed bu yul dbus ci 'dra/ shes ldan dag yul dbus ni yul rnams kyi mchog te/ sa lu dang bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs
211a7(1): pa slong mo pa brgyas khyab pa dbus pa'i skye bos gang ba/ mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bo spangs pa/ skye bo mkhas pA bsnan pa/ de nas kha rje dang / bsod nams dang / 
211a8(1): bar shis dang / gtsang ba dang gsang ba nyid kyi gnas su zag pa/ 'gram gnyis nas dran 'phro ba drang srong rnams kyis gnas shes bya ba chu dgur bcwa brgyang 'bab/ 
211b1(1): 'a spyonas na 'a sgyu du sbyim kyi ga sa smra du ba yin no// kye shed pa de ni sang la gyiganan 'didzi'o// yul dbus nama'as /

211b3(1): zhes ma sbas sam/ shed bu khyod kyi de skad sbas so// shed bu yul dbus na 'di lta ste dper na bdag cag gi mkhan po dang 'dra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod dam/ 
211b4(1): shes ldan dag yul dbus na bdag cag gyi mkhan pos gang drag gi gtong du lta bar yang mi nus na snyan par smra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod do// shed bu des de dgra
211b5(1): 'di lta de ltar yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'di ltar de dag thams cad yul dbus su 'dod 'dong bar 'gyur ro// de nas shed bu de dag gis yam sreg shing
211b6(1): dag btsal te/ yam sreg shing gi khur thogs nas bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yam sreg shing gi khur mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/ bram ze
211b7(1): ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ shed bu 'dir ci nas kyang bdag cag thams cad yul dbus
211b8(1): su mchi bar 'tshal bar gyur pa de ltar yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod do// bram ze des smras pa/ bu dag ji skad bgrod par bya ba yin nam/ 'di ltar yul dag ni
212a1(1): thos par dka' bar 'gyur ba yin pas/ mnyan par bya'i ma bzod par ni mi bya'o// mkhan po shed bu 'di'i mchid nas yul dbus na/ bdag
212a2(1): cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gdong du lta bar yang mi nus pa snyan par smra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag mchis so zhes mchi'o// bu kho bo na re swa'i steng na kho bo gcig/ 
212a3(1): bu kho na smra ba yin gyi smra ba gzhan 'ga' yang med do zhes zer ram/ sa ni rin po che mang po 'dzin pa yin pas/ sa bzhi ni mdzes pa dag gis gang ba yin no// mkhan por
212a4(1): shig yul de yang mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chu ngoms su nye reg kyang bgyi/ smra ba'i khyu mchog de dag la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi/ rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bgyi/ rang
212a5(1): gI grags pa yang bskrag par bgyi/ rnyed pa yang sgrub par bgyi/ bdag cag yul dbus su mchi'o// bram ze de slob ma la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa dang / 'khor nyung ba/ 
212a6(1): yin pas/ des shed bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bu dag gal te de lta na yang bzhi deng shing shun dang / dbu dgu dag dang / blugs gzar dag dang / ril ba dag lod
212a7(1): shig dang yul dbus su 'dong ngo // de dag gis de blangs nas bram ze de shed bu de dag dang lhan cig yul dbus su 'phags pa dang / des rgod pa kha cig ni tshar bcad de/ 
212a8(1): rgol ba'i shing rta'i sbyor ba byed/ kha cig ni mgor thal ba'i bum pa dag gis bstan/ kha cig ni 'bong gi dpongs sar kha bzhin du thag ring po nas yongs su spong bar byed/ 
212b1(1): kha dag ni gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / brangan dag gis bsu bar byed/ kha cig ni sgrub pa nyid du khas len par byed cing de mthar kyis grong dang / grong rdal dang da
212b2(1): tshogs dang tshong rdal dag tu rgol ba 'dul zhing ba ra na sir phyin to// bram ze des bsams pa bdag gis ci'i phyir rtsub spangs te yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo ma la nyug
212b3(1): par bya/ rgol ba gang dag dang mkhas par bgrang ba gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po dang nye ba yin gyi/ bdag kyang rgyal po'i gan du 'gro'o snyam nas/ 
212b4(1): ze de rgyal po kA kri ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po kri kI lu rgyal ba dang tshes 'phel bar byas te/ mtha' cig tu 'dug go// mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal
212b5(1): po kri kri la 'di skad ces smras so// lha bdag la bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig blangs pa mchis te/ de'i slad du lci'i spyan sngar rgol ba dag dang lhan cig bka' mchid
212b6(1): rnam par gtan la dbab par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos blon po rnams lnga smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i yul du bram ze 'dri dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la 'geb
212b7(1): par byed pa'i rgol ba 'ga' yod dam/ blon po rnams kyi sbas pa/ lha ri brags che ge mo zhig na bram ze ser skya zhi ba zhes bgyi ba/ rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi
212b8(1): pha rol du mchis pa/ zhugs lta bu'i shes pas rang gi sba ba gsal bar bgyid pa/ gzhan gyi smra ba tshar gcod pa rngo thog pa zhig mchis so// mkhan po de bos shig/ 
213a1(1): lha bod par bgyi'o zhes de dag gis de bos nas/ dri rgyal po kri krig la ba der song ste byin nas rgyal po kA kI la rgyal ba dang / tshe srel bar byas/ 
213a2(1): te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / blon po rnams kyi smras pa/ lha mkhan po 'di lag so// rgyal pos 'ongs pa legasaso// zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad de smras pa/ 
213a3(1): mkhan po khyod kho bo'i mdun du bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab par byed nus sam/ ser skya zhi bswa smras pa/ bdag gi rdo thog pa sro rgyal po dgyes
213a4(1): par bgyi'o// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes dag rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor bshoms shig/ phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dgra rnam par zhol shig/ blon po rnams
213a5(1): kyi rgol ba pa'i dkyil 'khor bshams shing / phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par gzhag go// de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 
213a6(1): spras pa/ lha phyogs snga ma gang bgyid du stsal/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ bram ze 'di 'gron pa yin gyi 'di phyogs snga ma byed du chug shig/ bram ze de phyogs snga ma byed du
213a7(1): 'jug ste/ des rgyud chags pa brgya bzlas so// ser skya zhi bas phyir bzlas te khyod kyi 'di ni rigs pa med pa yin no// 'di ni mi 'thun pa yin no// 'di ni mi 'thad
213a8(1): pa yin pa yin no// zhes skyon btags pa dang / bram ze cang mi smra bar 'dug go// tshar gcad pa'i gnas rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ lan la spobs pa med pa
213b1(1): 'di ni tha chad yin no// de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas smras pa/ mkhan po khyod gnas gang du gnas/ ser skya zhi bas smras pa/ lha ri zag che ge mo zhig du'o// 
213b2(1): khyod song la ri brags de khyod kyi rgol ba'i longs spyod gyis shig/ ser kya zhi bas rangs pa dang dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas/ skye bo mkhas pa dag gi/ 
213b3(1): yongs su bskor te/ ri thags der song ngo // 'jig rten 'byor pa 'dod pa yin pas ser skya zhi ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse
213b4(1): bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la bu ral pa ser skya can zhig btsas
213b5(1): nas/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khyi'u'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ 
213b6(1): khye'u 'di bram ze ser s+ya zhi ba'i bu yin la 'di'i ral pa yang ser skyar 'dug pas 'di'i ming ser skyar gdags so// zhes de'i ming ser skyar gtag so// de 'o ma zho dang
213b7(1): mar drang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan ya yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo drag gis srid par byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas po'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed
213b8(1): par byed do// de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe na yi ge dang grangs dang rtsis dang / lag rtsis dang / dbyung ba dang / gzhug pa dang / gzhag pa dang / 'byed pa dang //

215a5(1): dag don du mi gnyer ba yin no// ser skyas smras pa/ yab de bzhin bgyi'o// bram ze ser skya zhi ba na ba las ma langs te/ des rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang /

215a7(1): ltung 'gyur// zad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin// dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur// de shed pu ser skya dang nang mis gos sngon po da
215a8(1): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan te/ dur khrod du bskyal nas bsregs te de'i 'og tu mya ngan bsod ba byas nas 'khod do// 
215b1(1): lhophyogs nas lpags pa'i sgru ba de dag gis bram ze ser sna zhi bdus la bab ces zlos so// thos nas cad phan tshun smra bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag tham

215b5(1): ngag g.yul du phug ron bzhin du 'dus te/ nga'i drung du lcags kyi bram ze de'i bu'am phun nu bo 'ga' zhig yod/ lha de'i bu shed pu ser skya zhes bgyi ba mchis so// mkhan po de'i bu de
215b6(1): bos shig/ de dag gis de bros nas des rgyal po la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba byas te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de'i bu shed bu ser skya zhes bgyi ba
215b7(1): 'dri lag so// rgyal pos de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad nas sbas pa/ mkhan pa'i bu bram ze smra bar 'dod pa yul tha dad pa na gnas pa 'di dag
215b8(1): nga'i drung du lhags na/ khyod 'di dag dang lhan cig sba bar byed nus sam/ rdo thog gi lha dgyes par bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bshams shing phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs
216a1(1): dag rnam par bzhag ste/ de dag phyogs su ma byed du bcug pa dang / sla ba de dag bram ze ser sna dang lhan cig gzhi gang dang gang la smra ba de

216a3(1): kyi nang nas 'di lta ste lan la spobs pa med pa nyid 'di ni tha chad yin no// rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te e ma na tshod gzhon la shes rab kyi spobs pa 'di dang / 'di lta bu yod/

216a5(1): cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po yin pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed de/ ser skya des hab shur gyis rgol ba'i longs spyod 'phog tu bcug ste/ 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram snyam/ 
216a6(1): du de de ltar sems khongs su chud cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing 'dug pa na/ shed bu ser skya sba ba'i rgyal srid la dbang
216a7(1): bskur bas dbang bskur te/ skye bo mkhas pas yongasu bskor nas rang gi snum par 'ongs so// de nas de'i mas gus par bsgrims pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ bu khyod
216a8(1): kyis sbas pa thams cad tshar gcad dam/ ser skyas smras pa/ yum tsher bcad de 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams ni ma gtog so// ser skya'i ma de bzhin sbyar bar byed// 
216b1(1): lag mthi la gnyis zil byed do// shed bu ser smras smras pa/ yum khyod ci'i slad du bzhin sbyar ba mdzang/ lag mthil gnyis 'dril mdzad/ mas smras pa/ bu khyod da du ya

216b3(1): sbas smras pa/ yum bdag la ba'i mchid nas/ bu ji tsam nyi ma 'char ba dang nub pa de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyi kho ba 'das nas sba ba thams ca

217b3(1): bar dad par gyur nas/ bsams pa su zhig snying rje med cing 'jig rten pha rol pha rol btang ste/ 'di dag la rab tu sdang ba'i sems skyed cing 'di dag dang lhan cig rtsod

217b6(1): ba dang / ji tsam na bdag gi shul gyi bar du dge slong zhig mthong nas bdag gis de la kye dge slong sangs rgyas kyi bka' las cung zhig smos shig ces bgyis pa dang /
